column1: Visitors with other IPs will be blocked.
column2: Visitors with other IPs will be blocked.

column1: When blocking rule is triggered visitor will be redirected to a blank page with blocking rule description.
column2: When blocking rule applies then visitor will be redirected to a blank page with blocking rule description.

column1: You can specify multiple recipients. Comma separated. For example: admin1@example.com, admin2@example.com
column2: You can specify multiple recipients. Comma separated. For example: admin1@example.com, admin2@example.com

column1: Be careful not to lock yourself out!
column2: Be careful not to lock yourself out!

column1: Visitor will not be notified about blocking rule redirection.
column2: Visitor will not be notified about blocking rule redirection.

column1: Visitors with these IPs will not be redirected to maintenance page.
column2: Visitors with these IPs will not be redirected to maintenance page.

column1: This message will be shown on frontend for visitors with IP adresses from exception list while maintenance mode is on.
column2: This message will be shown on frontend for visitors with IP adresses from exception list while maintenance mode is on.

column1: Yes - mail notification will be sent every time when blocking rule applies. No - mail notification will be sent when IP is blocked for first time and each 10th time blocking occurs.
column2: Yes - mail notification will be sent every time when blocking rule applies. No - mail notification will be sent when IP is blocked for first time and each 10th time blocking occurs.
